original_text: He says, ‘Eat and drink as much as you want,’ but he does not really mean that. He is thinking about the cost of the food.
korean_text: 대저 그 마음의 생각이 어떠하면 그 위인도 그러한즉 그가 네게 먹고 마시라 할지라도 그의 마음은 너와 함께 하지 아니함이라

sentences.original_text: Eat and drink as much as you want
but he does not really mean that
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 정말로 그렇게 생각하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: He is thinking about the cost of the food
